name: Travellers Oasis Backpackers

reviews.text: I had a great 3 nights in this hostel and felt so comfortable here! I really enjoyed my stay and would definitely stay again if i was back in Cairns.
reviews.title: A really special hostel where I felt totally at home

reviews.text: All the good things:
reviews.title: Friendly, helpful and relaxed!

reviews.text: - no bunk beds
reviews.title: Amazing!

reviews.text: - free wifi that worked
reviews.title: Lovely hostel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: - crockery and cutlery in kitchen that didn't need a deposit
reviews.title: Nice hostel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed three times at the Travellers Oasis as we were exploring the Cairns area. It is simply one of the best backpackers in Northern Queensland. The staff is absolutely charming and very helpful if you would like to do some activities up there. All rooms and common areas are very clean and lovely decorated. We can only recommend you to stay there.
reviews.title: The place to stay in Cairns

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I am typing this review as I sit in the Travellers Oasis garden on my last night in Cairns. My fiance and I stayed here for a total of 6 nights and this was our base for exploring Cairns, the GBR and a side trip to Airlie Beach. Every time we leave on our side trips I find myself missing home (aka Travellers Oasis).
reviews.title: Great Stay! - I will miss this place

reviews.text: Pros:
reviews.title: Great
Home away from home
reviews.text: - The Staff. Helen and Rea were both wonderful. They take the time to learn your names and travel plans and make good recommendations. The staff have been on a lot of the tours they recommend so their advice is from experience.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: - Location. Across the street from Cairns Central shopping mall = easy access to Coles for groceries, and cheap eats at the food court. You can cut through to the mall to get to Shields St (main strip with bars/restaurants & esplanade).. 20 mins walk.
reviews.title: Great, friendly hostel

reviews.text: My best friend and I took a quick trip around Australia the past week and a half (we packed a lot into 10 days!)... when we visited Cairns we stayed at Travellers, and it was fantastic! This was the only hostel I have ever stayed at, and it has set the bar pretty high for any others!
reviews.title: No complaints!

reviews.text: As terrible as this sounds, the free wifi was one of the most appreciated features. Being from the US we were only able to contact our loved ones back home when we had wifi, so the fact that it was 24/7 free (and worked great even in the rooms) was SO NICE.
reviews.title: Loved it - going back!
AMAZING!!!!!!
reviews.text: We missed out on the pizza night, as we left that morning but I hear the theme nights are great. The staff was super friendly, the place was incredibly clean.
The fact that they loan you beach towels and bath towels is beyond amazing. Who wants to drag that with them on vacation!?
reviews.title: Amazing hostel! If you want a chilled out place to stay with amazingly helpful staff, stay here!

reviews.text: There were plenty of bathrooms and showers, so you never had to wait longer than 5 min if that. The kitchen looked really well stocked, we never used it though. The fridge in the room was a nice touch, we picked up a few snacks at the grocery across the street.
reviews.title: Fab hostel in cairns, very relaxed and super helpful staff

reviews.text: Staff are so friendly (helen, rhia and hannah are very welcoming) Its a lovely place to meet people. Definately recommend the monday pizza night. Great little pool and eating area. Lovely place to chill, people hit the bars at 10pm and no noise aftr that so good place if u want to go out of if u want to have a quiet night in. Helen knows every tour and trip going as well. We really enjoyed it. Thanks everyone. Phill.
reviews.title: One of the best places we have ever stayed. Staff are amazing, hostel is a great place to meet people even if ur not staying in

reviews.text: I've visited Cairns only for a 2day trip due to only having one month to spend in Australia and found this nice cosy hostel on the internet.
reviews.title: Wonderful place to stay in Cairns
Wonderful
reviews.text: The room was very clean and the safe is a much welcome free extra !
The hostel is only a 10 min walk from city center / harbor so everything is real close by and location is ideal ! ( also very close to car rental shop Europcar --> 5 min walk )
reviews.title: Coming to Cairns? This is the place to stay!
not too old
reviews.text: The staff is very friendly and helpful. If you want to book something in Cairns ( daytrips etc ) then ask for Helen and she will surely help you out getting the best deals out there !

description: Welcome to Travellers Oasis Backpackers Hostel in Cairns.Travellers Oasis is a charming little guest house offering cosy and clean facilities to the budget conscious traveller, in a friendly and relaxed environment.Centrally located in a quiet area, our guests can relax in our sparkling pool, or lie back in our hammocks and chill out to the music.
